alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 6:08AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Emery...eastern Carbon and southern Duchesne Counties through 700 AM MDT... At 608 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wellington, or 7 miles southeast of Price, moving east at 40 mph. Additional strong thunderstorms are located to the east of the main storm. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Sunnyside and East Carbon. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 246 and 264. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
